name: The glimmering robes of Gruumsh
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has tiny armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'smash'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely fast.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'holy might'.
